p.d: Rita is determined to make Heritage Day a truly memorable occasion. Yolande attends in the hope that her resourcefulness will open doors for her. Will Terri finally see the finishing line for her world tour by bike? The festival is certain to be full of surprises... Directed by: Jean-Marc Piché (season 2, Canada, 2019) Screenplay: Patricia Léger Cast: Patricia Léger (Rita Melanson), Marie-Jo Thério (Yolande LeBlanc), Marcel-Romain Thériault (Lomer Dupuis), Marc Lamontagne (Edmour LeBlanc), Raphaël Butler (Ferraille Gaudet), Claire Normand (Gilberte Cormier), Gabriel Robichaud (Zoël Bourgeois), Bianca Richard (Terri Cormier) Genre: comedy
